description: jQuery source code for handling element value retrieval and setting, including support for options, select elements, radio buttons, and checkboxes.

methods.name: val
methods.description: Gets or sets the value of form elements, with support for different input types and custom hooks.

methods.name: valHooks.option.get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of an option element, falling back to the text content if value attribute is missing.

methods.name: valHooks.select.get
methods.description: Retrieves the selected value(s) from a select element, supporting single and multiple selections.

methods.name: valHooks.select.set
methods.description: Sets the selected options of a select element based on provided value(s).

methods.name: valHooks.radio.set
methods.description: Sets the checked state of radio and checkbox inputs based on an array of values.

methods.name: valHooks.radio.get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of radio and checkbox inputs, defaulting to 'on' if no value attribute is set.
